FuncDef: This command configures the forward action.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies forwarding the SF IPv4 address for the action in a VAS filter entry.
Specifies forwarding the SF IPv6 address for the action in a VAS filter entry.
Specifies the service ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Specifies the ESI for the action in a VAS filter entry. Values-10-byte Ethernet Segment Identifier:.
